title: Twenty Agent Manifest
description: Schema for Twenty AI agent configuration files

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for validation and IDE support

standardId.description: Unique identifier for the agent (UUID format recommended)

name.description: Internal name for the agent (camelCase, used in code)

label.description: Human-readable display name for the agent

description.description: Brief description of what the agent does

icon.description: Icon for the agent (emoji or icon name)

prompt.description: System prompt that defines the agent's behavior and personality

modelId.description: AI model to use for this agent

schema.description: JSON schema for structured responses (required when type is 'json')

examples.name: customerSupportAgent
examples.label: Customer Support Assistant
examples.description: Helps customers with their inquiries and issues
examples.prompt: You are a helpful customer support agent. Always be polite, professional, and solution-oriented.
